content: {"name": "First Moravian Church - Fishes and Loaves Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Contact us at [Tapestry Community Center Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/TapestryCommunityCenter) to confirm distribution.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.riversidemoravian.org/monthlynewsletters", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "228 East Washington Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Riverside", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08075", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0361968, "longitude": -74.9538365}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 461-0132", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
